item.title: Citadelle Gin
item.description: Citadelle Gin is a premium French gin that is distilled in Cognac, France. It is produced using 19 botanicals, including juniper berries, coriander, angelica, licorice, orange peel, lemon peel, cassia bark, nutmeg, cardamom, and grains of paradise. One of the unique things about Citadelle Gin is that it is distilled in small batches in a traditional copper pot still over an open flame, which is said to give the gin a fuller, richer flavor.
